trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Gir støtte for utforming i en visuelle utformeren for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> Web serverkontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control represents a data source that calls methods of a business object in order to perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen representerer en datakilde som kaller metoder for et objekt for business for å utføre operasjoner Delete, Insert, velg og oppdatere databasen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: I en visuelle utformeren når du bytter fra kilden til utformingsvisning markup kildekode som beskriver den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen analyseres og en utformingen versjon av kontrollen er opprettet på utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Når du går tilbake til visning i datakilden, er utformingen kontrollen beholdt i markup kildekode og redigeres i markup for websiden.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ObjectDataSourceDesigner gir støtte for utforming for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen i en visuelle utformeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceDesigner class members provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property indicates whether the Configure Data Source wizard can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: ObjectDataSourceDesigner klassen medlemmene inneholder følgende funksjonalitet: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>egenskapen angir om veiviseren konfigurerer datakilde kan vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property indicates whether the schema of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control can be refreshed at design time.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>egenskapen angir om skjemaet for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen kan oppdateres under utformingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property specifies the method that performs the Select function.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>Egenskapen angir metodene som utfører funksjonen Select.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property specifies the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>egenskapen angir typen business-objekt som inneholder dataene for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method returns a data source view with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>Metoden returnerer en datakildevisning med det angitte navnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method returns a list of data source view names for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>metoden returnerer en liste over visningsnavn på datakilder for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method extracts the metadata for the Select method from the associated business object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>metoden trekker ut metadata for metoden Select fra tilknyttede business-objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method causes the Configure Data Source wizard to be displayed on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>Metoden får veiviseren konfigurerer datakilde som skal vises i visual utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method removes properties from, adds additional properties to, or shadows properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>metoden fjerner egenskaper fra, legger til flere egenskaper til eller skygger egenskapene for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control or a copy of that control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework internt bygger en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>klasse når det oppretter den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontroll eller en kopi av denne kontrollen i visual utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>metoder kan kalles.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method can be called, and the CanConfigure property is `true`, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control implements either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>metoder kan kalles og egenskapen CanConfigure `true`, hvis den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen implementerer enten den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService>eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the CanConfigure is `true`, the **Configure Data Source** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Hvis CanConfigure `true`, **konfigurere datakilden** menyelementet vises i den **vanlige oppgaver for ObjectDataSource** hurtigmenyen for den tilknyttede kontrollen i visual utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The Configure Data Source wizard is invoked when this menu item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Veiviseren konfigurerer datakilde aktiveres når dette alternativet er valgt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>-metoden kan bare kalles; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> ellers.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>metoder kan kalles.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method can be called, and the CanRefreshSchema property is `true`, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control implements either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interface, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> properties both contain a value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>metoder kan kalles og egenskapen CanRefreshSchema `true`, hvis den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen implementerer enten den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService>eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService>grensesnittet og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>begge inneholder en verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the CanRefreshSchema is `true`, the **Refresh Schema** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Hvis CanRefreshSchema `true`, **Oppdater skjemaet** menyelementet vises i den **vanlige oppgaver for ObjectDataSource** hurtigmenyen for den tilknyttede kontrollen i visual utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>kan være kall; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Displays the Configure Data Source wizard on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Viser veiviseren konfigurerer datakilde i visual utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The Configure method initiates a transaction that causes the Configure Data Source wizard to appear on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Konfigurer starter en transaksjon som gjør at veiviseren konfigurerer datakilde skal vises på visuelle utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The Configure method is called when you select the **Configure Data Source** menu item on the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurer-metoden kalles når du velger den **konfigurere datakilden** menyelement på den **vanlige oppgaver for ObjectDataSource** hurtigmenyen for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The **Configure Data Source** menu item appears on the context menu when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den **konfigurere datakilden** menyelementet vises på hurtigmenyen når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a data source view with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en datakildevisning med det angitte navnet.

trans-unit.source: The GetView method returns an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetView returnerer en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>objektet med det angitte navnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: If `viewName` is `null` or an empty string (""), the first view name in the array of names that is returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> is used as the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `viewName` er `null` eller en tom streng (""), første visningsnavn i matrisen med navn som er returnert av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>brukes som det angitte navnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no view names are returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>, GetView generates an unnamed <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen visningsnavn returneres av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>, GetView genererer en uten navn <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An with the name specified by viewName.
trans-unit.target: En med navnet som er angitt av viewName .

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of data source view names for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en liste over visningsnavn på datakilder for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The GetViewNames method gets the view names from the names of the schema data tables of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetViewNames henter visningsnavnene fra navnene på datatabellene skjema for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> objects of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En strengmatrise som inneholder navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> objekter av den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Brukes av designer Fjern egenskaper fra eller legge til flere egenskaper i visningen i den **Egenskaper** rutenett eller skyggen egenskapene for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen utviklere bruker metodene som er avledet fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden skyggelegge ulike egenskaper for kontroll med tilsvarende utformingen egenskaper som designer implementerer, og du kan legge til egenskaper til eller Fjern egenskaper fra den **Egenskaper** rutenett.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The PreFilterProperties method creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control so that they appear in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PreFilterProperties oppretter utformingen egenskapene til skyggen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>egenskapene for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollere slik at de vises i den **Egenskaper** rutenett med den visuelle utformeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: En samling implementering av <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>av egenskapene tillagt og skyggelagt.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Extracts the metadata for the Select method from the business object that is specified by the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Trekker ut metadata for metoden Select business-objektet som er angitt av den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The RefreshSchema method extracts the metadata for the method that is named by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property from the <xref:System.Type> object that is named by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property, which is the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RefreshSchema trekker ut metadata for metoden som heter av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>egenskapen fra den <xref:System.Type>objektet som heter av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>egenskap, som angir typen business-objektet som inneholder dataene for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: The metadata is saved in a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> array and in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> array of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Metadataene som er lagret i en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>matrise og i den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A>matrise med designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, does not display error messages when exceptions occur during processing; otherwise, exception messages are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, samsvarer ikke vise feilmeldinger når det oppstår et unntak under behandling; ellers unntak meldinger vises.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to execute when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*> method of the associated control is called.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på metoden som skal kjøres når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*>metoden for den tilknyttede kontrollen kalles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The SelectMethod property shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: SelectMethod egenskapen skygger i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>-egenskapen for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the SelectMethod property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is updated.
trans-unit.target: Når verdien for egenskapen SelectMethod endres, utformingen markup for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontroll er oppdatert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method is called, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is true; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>-metoden, hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>egenskapen er true; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the method to execute when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*> is called.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder navnet på metoden som skal kjøres når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*>kalles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the type that contains the methods that are specified in the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på typen som inneholder metodene som er angitt i den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The TypeName property shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: TypeName egenskapen skygger i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>-egenskapen for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the TypeName property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is updated.
trans-unit.target: Når verdien for egenskapen TypeName endres, utformingen markup for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontroll er oppdatert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method is called, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is true; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>-metoden, hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>egenskapen er true; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the type that contains the methods that perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations specified in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder navnet på typen som inneholder metoder som utfører med å slette, Insert-, Select- og Update databasen operasjoner som er angitt i den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref>.
